TopicTitle: I think I'm about to give in to the urge

Articles.Content:
Any tips on what versions of Blender and Unity I should acquire that work best with KSP these days?

I know the .mu importer only works with older versions of blender.

Any other headaches that are new?

@Randazzo Latest Unity editor (well, I have 2019.4.16f1 to be exact) and latest Part Tools works fine (but delete Part Tools' Autolight.cginc file after import...or uncheck this before/during import if possible). The Blender version limit for the .mu importer is 2.7.0. That's all I know, sadly (I don't use Blender for most things...only for unwrap and for importing .mu), but I'm fine.

Edited January 12, 2022 by JadeOfMaar

https://github.com/Parzival-3141/io_object_mu

This blender plugin should work with the newer versions of blender, but if you want to import models, you might have to do it twice in a row.
Thank you for the replies, the information is much appreciated!
Man it's like fumbling around in a dark room that you used to know - things come back to you as you bump into them.
